channel.title: TrisidiaX Level Shop
channel.description: okay i downloaded a trisidia base and was hoping on hosting it and code it. i found out that u change the level shop item prices in the shopassistant.java. i successfully changed some of the items once, but now i tried to do it again and nothing happens. i was wondering on how i could fix this?

item.title: TrisidiaX Level Shop
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Karma_K:

i just change the case #### which is how ur suppose to change how much an item costs

I’ve never seen a Shop System like that before in a RuneScape Private Server, unless those were selected for specific relegation. I believe you might be changing the Currency I.D. or something similar. This is yet one more reason why TrisidiaX is NOT a decent Base for beginners.

Read full topic

item.title: TrisidiaX Level Shop
item.dc:creator: @Karma_K1 Karma_K
item.description:
@Karma_K1 wrote:

no i dont get an error or anything. i just change the case #### which is how ur suppose to change how much an item costs. i change it and compile but it doesnt apply on the server. id go bak and look in shopassist and itd say the number i wrote in.

Read full topic
